item.title: Rust Cal
item.description: rust-cal Link to heading This is a project I built as part of my attempt to begin learning Rust. I thought it’d be fun to easily and quickly display my university timetable for the day in my terminal (as I’m using my laptop throughout most of the day). It accesses my timetable by making a request to the iCalendar URL provided by the university for timetable syncing, and uses the ical crate to parse the resulting .
